work-gdmcom.statement1: Working student in the Information and Communication Technology department
work-gdmcom.statement2: Automation of recurring tasks in the domain of Microsoft Office Suite and file storages
work-gdmcom.statement3: Implementing a prototype for the automated creation of an overview of business locations from file directories

work-ipoque-intern.statement1: Creation of generic Angular component(s) to present UI-components via a showcase
work-ipoque-intern.statement2: Asynchronous implementation of business/render logic using RxJS
work-ipoque-intern.statement3: Automated rendering of various form elements based on a custom configuration

work-ipoque-bachelor.statement1: Conception, design and implementation of a domain-specific language for the creation of component source code
work-ipoque-bachelor.statement2: Designing and implementing a compiler for a custom programming language
work-ipoque-bachelor.statement3: Generation of generic Angular source code based on domain-specific solution approaches using different design patterns (dependency injection, inversion of control, etc.)

work-ipoque-working-student.statement1: Further development of a domain specific language and the associated compiler with implementation of plugins for various IDEs
work-ipoque-working-student.statement2: Development of DevOps oriented automation scripts for continuous delivery pipelines
work-ipoque-working-student.statement3: Implementing various tests (unit test, integration tests, end-2-end) for the quality accurance

dsl.headline: Domain-specific language
dsl.description: A domain-specific language for the easy and expressive creation of a showcase for UI-components.

dag.headline: Directed Acyclic Graph Visualization
dag.description: An implementation of the sugiyama algorithm using the barycenter heuristic. The app visualize a directed acyclic graph with the help of D3.

weatherData.headline: XML Wether Data Visualization
weatherData.description: Definition of an XML schema based on weather data from the U.S. Climate Reference Network. The XML is visualized using XSL transformation and D3.js.
